name: Waythed 2 (JoacoN)
description:
[Description]:

Wayted 2 is a hard platformer based on old flash troll games, whose goal was to create a hard experience utilising simple mechanics and gimmicks.

In this game you will be able to experience changing cameras, hidden platforms, tight jumps, and more in inverted gravity.

*Epilepsy Warning: Fast bright moving elements, Bright colours, Repeating Patterns*

[Features]:

- 2 hours worth of content

- 15 self contained challenges

- 4 guide tutorials for players who need extra help

- 10 iconic musical pieces

- Accessibility options

- Available in Windows, Linux, and Android

[Info]:

Visit the discord servers!:

Playtesters: DEstillo, GerriTime
